turn.text: But -- but once you --

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: -- the case or controversy actually frame.

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: (Voice Overlap) they denied you.

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: On this --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: They denied you access to the inner circle, you mean?They wouldn't let you talk to the Secretary?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: No, sir.
But they will not exercise any discretion in either the State billing office or --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: And that resulted in what?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: That resulted in this actual case not -- that's not being a lot of petition for reclassification with any likelihood of success.

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: But you could have applied?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: We did apply for both a temporary --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: But what they did, they denied you the right to apply?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: Yes.
And --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: But he did apply?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: We applied for both a temporary withdraw --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: You're not.
Do you --

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: -- and for a segregation.

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: -- do you recognize or do you agree with me that it has a completely unconstitutional statute on the books?
And it applies to you and the statute says that the Secretary of Interior can either give you $1 million or no, nothing, and you have no redress from his action.
Do you have a cause of action?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: Mr. Justice Marshall --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: You know, because he might give it to you.
Isn't that the answer?
He might give you the million.

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: But in -- in construing the statute --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: Isn't it possible that the Secretary of the Interior could rule with you in this case?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: It's not possible now.
He's finally with agency action close the door and rest his position on an assertion of absolute discretion formed in 1894 Act.
We suggest there's no such discretion there.

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: And that prevents you from doing what?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: It prevents us from, as to these particular lands, the possibility of moving them in the Carey Act development from framing an actual case or controversy.

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: So you've been denied the right to land, which you otherwise are entitled to?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: Yes.

And -- and the vehicle of -- of that denial was an assertion of absolute discretion and a refusal to follow the dictate of the District Court in allowing us to petition for reclassification and determining.

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: I'm not interested in all these explanations.
I'm interested in what factually injured you.

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: Alright.
And I've indicated --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: Are you injured?

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: Mr. Justice Marshall --

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: If you don't have this with the human land, to use as you please.

turn.speaker: david_h_leroy
turn.label: Mr. David H. Leroy
turn.text: Yes, Your Honor.
Thank you, Mr. Chief Justice.

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: Thank you, gentlemen.
The case is submitted.
We'll hear arguments next in --
